description:
goprotobuf: Switch to using protobuf-2.5.0 as the baseline.

Regenerating descriptor.pb.go also lays the path for using SourceCodeInfo in the code generator.

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

On 26 July 2013 13:31,  <r@golang.org> wrote:

> doesn't the README need updating?

The README doesn't say anything about protoc requirements. I think
it's reasonable to expect the latest stable version.

LGTM
although maybe at least the landing page in code.google.com/p should say something

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=b2329caf408c ***

goprotobuf: Switch to using protobuf-2.5.0 as the baseline.

Regenerating descriptor.pb.go also lays the path for using SourceCodeInfo in the code generator.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11893043

On 26 July 2013 16:04,  <r@golang.org> wrote:

> although maybe at least the landing page in code.google.com/p should say
> something

Actually it did. It said "you must be running version 2.3 or higher",
so I just updated that.

subject: code review 11893043: goprotobuf: Switch to using protobuf-2.5.0 as the baseline.
